question: [File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/block_executor/mod.rs] [Integration] [Transaction slice metadata] Can TransactionSliceMetadata be crafted to cause incorrect transaction ordering or skipping? (High)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/block_executor/mod.rs] [Integration] [Transaction commit hook] Can TransactionCommitHook be exploited to modify or block transaction commitment? (High)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/block_executor/mod.rs] [Integration] [TxnProvider race] Can TxnProvider return different transactions for the same index across validators? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/block_executor/mod.rs] [Integration] [AuxiliaryInfo tampering] Can AuxiliaryInfo be manipulated to bypass transaction validation or alter execution behavior? (High)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/block_executor/mod.rs] [Edge case] [Empty block] Can empty blocks (num_txns == 0) cause division by zero or other arithmetic errors? (Medium)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/block_executor/mod.rs] [Edge case] [Single transaction block] Can blocks with exactly one transaction bypass parallel execution checks incorrectly? (Low)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/block_executor/mod.rs] [Edge case] [Maximum block size] Can blocks at maximum size cause integer overflow in size calculations? (High)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/block_executor/mod.rs] [Edge case] [Transaction at position 0] Can the partition_point calculation fail when all transactions have retry status? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/block_executor/mod.rs] [Edge case] [Module write with no resource writes] Can transactions with only module writes bypass resource conflict detection? (Medium)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/block_executor/mod.rs] [Edge case] [All transactions discarded] Can blocks where all transactions are discarded cause issues with state commitment? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/block_executor/mod.rs] [Error condition] [Materialization during error] Can transactions trigger materialization errors that leave the output in an inconsistent state? (High)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/block_executor/mod.rs] [Error condition] [Panic propagation] Can panics in user code propagate through the block executor and crash validator nodes? (High)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/block_executor/mod.rs] [Validation] [Fee statement validation bypass] Can fee statements be modified after validation but before commitment? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/block_executor/mod.rs] [Validation] [Epoch event validation] Can epoch events bypass signature verification by being injected during output materialization? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/block_executor/mod.rs] [Validation] [Write set validation] Can write sets bypass size or permission checks during the incorporation of materialized data? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/block_executor/mod.rs] [Validation] [Transaction output status] Can transaction status be modified from Keep to Discard after execution but before commitment? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/block_executor/mod.rs] [Determinism] [Non-deterministic HashMap iteration] Can HashSet or HashMap iteration order cause non-deterministic execution across validators? (Critical)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/block_executor/mod.rs] [Determinism] [Float point operations] Can any float operations in size calculations cause non-deterministic results? (High)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/block_executor/mod.rs] [Determinism] [Timestamp dependencies] Can any operations depend on system time, causing non-deterministic execution? (Critical)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/block_executor/mod.rs] [Determinism] [Thread scheduling] Can thread scheduling differences cause non-deterministic parallel execution results? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/block_executor/mod.rs] [Consensus] [State root mismatch] Can different validators compute different state roots for the same block due to execution differences? (Critical)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/block_executor/mod.rs] [Consensus] [Block output ordering] Can the ordering of outputs in BlockOutput differ across validators? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/block_executor/mod.rs] [Epoch transition] [Epoch event injection] Can malicious validators inject multiple epoch events in a single block to cause rapid reconfigurations? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/block_executor/mod.rs] [Epoch transition] [Module cache invalidation] Can epoch transitions fail to invalidate the module cache, causing execution with stale modules? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/block_executor/mod.rs] [Epoch transition] [Speculative log flush] Can epoch transitions in the middle of a block cause incorrect speculative log flushing? (Medium)
